channel.title: [PI]Dupes![PI]
channel.description:
I really need urgent help!
Player A trades Player B. Player B offers an item to Player A. Player A clicks on the mini map. Player A and Player B both get the item Player B offered.
I need to be able to make it so while in trade, you can't walk/move.
HELP PLEASE!:(

item.title: [PI]Dupes![PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:409730”][quote author=AnonymousZ link=topic=511006.msg3708133#msg3708133 date=1313176798]

if(c.inTrade) { c.sendMessage("You can't move while in trade."); return; }

Will that work?
[/quote]

It should. It depends on the context though.

Although, I can’t remember if the client automatically closes the interface when you click the minimap. In that case, you would need to add it to where the walking packet is handled.[/quote]

I downloaded a PI and tested this ‘dupe’ that was the first thing I tried, I did not work.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Dupes![PI]
item.dc:creator: @AnonymousZ AnonymousZ
item.description:
@AnonymousZ wrote:

if(c.inTrade) { c.sendMessage("You can't move while in trade."); c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); return; }

That worked xD!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Dupes![PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“AnonymousZ, post:4, topic:409730”]if(c.inTrade) { c.sendMessage("You can't move while in trade."); return; }

Will that work?[/quote]

It should. It depends on the context though.

Although, I can’t remember if the client automatically closes the interface when you click the minimap. In that case, you would need to add it to where the walking packet is handled.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Dupes![PI]
item.dc:creator: @AnonymousZ AnonymousZ
item.description:
@AnonymousZ wrote:

if(c.inTrade) { c.sendMessage("You can't move while in trade."); return; }

Will that work?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Dupes![PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

Walking packet, add a line that declines the trade when moving.

This.

Also, if people implemented a proper TradeSession type class, all of these trade bugs would be solved.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Dupes![PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Walking packet, add a line that declines the trade when moving.
